channel.title: Announcements on IKMC
channel.description: Recent content in Announcements on IKMC

item.title: Summer Movie Review Contest!
item.description: Hello, lovers of good cinema! The Movie Club of IISER Kolkata is thrilled to announce an exciting opportunity for all movie enthusiasts with some free time this summer ‚Äì the Summer Movie Review Writing Contest! üìΩÔ∏è Do you love watching movies and sharing your thoughts about them? Do you have a flair for writing and a passion for cinema? Do you overthink your ratings on Letterboxd? Or do you love a good movie and have never written a review?

item.title: Website Launch!
item.description: We are delighted to launch our brand-new IISER Kolkata Movie Club website! This will be the hub for all things cinema in IISER Kolkata - a place where we host reviews, posters, short films, etc. produced by our community of cinephiles. This will also be where we keep you updated about upcoming screenings, and news regarding the club and its activities. Looking forward to a thriving and lively online community!
